attributes.additional_details:
The following should be made to forfeit their rights under Human Rights Legislation.

Criminals found guilty of a crime for which they can be sentenced to more than 6 months imprisonment while serving their sentence. (Includes parole time)

Illegal immigrants, including asylum seekers.

Foreign nationals undergoing deportation proceedings for any reason.

Remember; we can depend on our judges to do the right thing without recourse to this legislation.
